Preparation 1:
Creative an Impressive Resume
A tailored resume will help you differentiate yourself from the competition . Crafting a tailored resume lists your outstanding qualities and achievements .
Use NUS Vmock to enhance further. Use this tool to test your knowledge of NUS events in the U.S.
Source: https://nus.edu.sg/cfg/students/career-resources/create-an-impressive-resume .
Preparation 2:
Ace Your Job Interviews
A job interview is an opportunity for the employer to evaluate your skills, personal motivations, interest in their work and your fit for their organization .
To showcase the best version of yourself, it is important to go into an interview well prepared . Go into a job interview prepared to be the best person you can be .
Source 1 (Job interviews): https://nus.edu.sg/cf/students/career-resources/interview/ace-your-job-interviews . Source 1: Job interviews: http://www.
Source 2 (Questions to ask): https://www.indeed.com/career-advice/interviewing/internship-interview-questions .

Bonus 2
Job portals are a quick and efficient way to find a variety of suitable job options . However, only 20-30% of available jobs are posted on portals .
To gain access to all the other hidden jobs out there, adopt a multi-pronged approach in your internship/ job search .
Job-search-strategies can be used to help students find a new job . Nusus.edu. students are encouraged to use these strategies to find a job .
